zimbra_account_order_legal_checkbox: I accept that OVH will set up the service immediately after validating my order, and I therefore expressly renounce my right to cancel under the provisions of Article L.121-21-8 of the French Consumer Code.
zimbra_account_order_no_product_error_me: There was a problem loading the product related to your order. We apologize and try again later.
zimbra_account_order_initiated_subtitle: If you have been unable to complete your order, please complete it by clicking on the following link:
zimbra_account_order_initiated_info: We will notify you via email about the availability of your accounts.
